titleStmt.title: རྣམ་པར་སྣང་མཛད་མངོན་པར་རྫོགས་པ་བྱང་ཆུབ་པའི་རྒྱུད་ཀྱི་ཆེན་པོའི་ཚིག་འགྲེལ།
rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs pa byang chub pa'i rgyud kyi chen po'i tshig 'grel/
A Word Commentary on the Great Tantra of “The Manifest Complete Enlightenment of Vairocana”
རྣམ་པར་སྣང་མཛད་མངོན་པར་རྫོགས་པ་བྱང་ཆུབ་པའི་རྒྱུད་ཀྱི་ཆེན་པོའི་ཚིག་འགྲེལ་ཞེས་བྱ་བ།
rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs pa byang chub pa'i rgyud kyi chen po'i tshig 'grel zhes bya ba/

bibl.author: Buddhaguhya
yul dbus kyi ban+de gzhon nu dpal

notesStmt.note: According to the Derge colophon, this translation was made from a text at Narthang. It further states that parts of the commentary were based on a manuscript that was corrupt, so the original translation had problems. It was retranslated according to Ska-ba Dpal-brtseg's system of translating tantra, and then revised to render it into a more contemporary Tibetan style. This latter translation was then transcribed by 'Gos Gzhon-nu-dpal at the Vihāra of Dpal Rtse-thang and constitutes the current canonical edition.
